about_the_game:
Game Introduction

"Forge Lord" is a pure 3D top-down action RPG with elements of roguelike gameplay.

In the game, you will play as an immortal Forge Lord from another realm, continuously breaking the defenses of the physical world, unleashing endless fury, crushing every enemy that stands in your way, and completing a "revenge plan" that spans millennia.

Skill Introduction

  • Devastating Fist
    Harness the power of the primordial forge to launch a destructive high-speed punch, devastating the area within range.

  • Giant Stomp
    Use giant-like steps to stomp the earth, tearing the ground apart and crushing fragile lives.

  • Forge Charge
    Instantly increase the forge's output torque, bursting forth with unmatched explosive power for a high-speed dash.

  • Armor Forging
    Use the forge to condense and cast indestructible armor, constructing a new defense.

Deity Introduction

As a powerful warlord, you will receive assistance from other dark deities. They include the Deity of Conquest, Deity of Horror, Deity of Greed, and Deity of Bane.

Skill Shard Introduction

Throughout the game, you will continuously acquire skill shards representing the attributes of different dark deities in various ways. These powerful skill shards can enhance your skills, granting initial skills different attributes.

Deity Skill System

Combining different shards of the same Deity can unlock more powerful Deity skills. Different combinations will result in different skills, offering players more tactical choices and gaming enjoyment. Equipping shards in other skill slots can provide additional benefits to skills.

Item System

The item system in the game is also crucial. A variety of consumables and functional items will help you make more "destructive" choices based on different battlefield environments.

Event System

Whenever players pass a small level, a random event will be triggered. These events may enhance enemy abilities or increase or decrease player attributes, making the adventure more tense and exciting.

Power System

As the game progresses, the Forge Lord will gradually recover his divine power, becoming stronger.
